title: Violence Jack: Hell's Wind-hen (Violence Jack: Hell's Wind)
synopsis: The survivors of Kanto's Hell Earthquake built a new city and christened it "Hope Town". However, this peaceful town becomes a nightmare when it's raided by the motorcycle gang, "Hell's Wind". They abduct the women while the remaining townsfolk are left helpless against them.
related_anime: ['Violence Jack: Harlem Bomber-hen', 'Violence Jack', 'Violence Jack: Jigoku Gai-hen']
